name: NPC Pack #1
description:
NPC PACK #1

A set of NPCs for use in Vampire the Masquerade V5! Made for our podcast Blank Bodies, these NPCs are designed to help an ST flesh out their game world; and provide interesting antagonists and allies for their chronicles.

Also included is our custom form-fillable character sheet! Made by our friend Nerdbert, these stylish and simple to use sheets will make you the talk of the LARP.

If you enjoy these, please check out us out wherever podcasts are found, and take a peek at our Patreon if you'd like to support our show.

BLANKBODIES.com

Benni was built on Episode 4: Character Creation - Late Night at Gravy's

Bobby and Brutus were built on Ventrue Bonus Episode! - Pervert of the People - Larry Flynt
